item.description:
Hi, Everyone,

I know it's short notice, but if anyone is interested Peter would like to do a 10 or 15 mile ride from the Concord Monument tomorrow.

So if you would like to do it meet him there at 10:30, he will get your responses when you sign up.

This is not a formal Greater Boston Cycling Group meetup so we take no responsibility for problems or emergency's that could occur while riding..

Peter is simply looking for some people that might be interested in riding tomorrow.

I hope you can join him

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Peter at the Monument
item.name: Let's ride in Concord
